message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value and your interest, I propose a price of $10,000 for it. This price reflects its high quality and the potential value it could bring to you. Please let me know if this offer suits your expectations.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product, $10,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for it. This is a fair price considering my budget and the value I see in your product.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product and your budget, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $9,000 for the product. This still reflects its high quality and potential value, while being more accommodating to your budget. Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $9,000 is still a bit out of my range.  However, I'm willing to go up to $8,800.  This price is a good compromise, given the value of the product and my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your flexibility. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept a price of $8,900 for the product. This price reflects its high quality and value, while also being within your budget. I believe this is a mutually beneficial arrangement. Please let me know if this offer works for you.
